United Kingdom
Price: ₹7,90,000/-
Living in the UK:
Embrace the UK's history and cultural tapestry. Kickstart your life within dynamic cities and stunning countryside.
UK Immigration Opportunities
UK Self Sponsorship Visa
  • Apply for settlement (ILR) after 5 years.
  • Endorsement by an approved endorsing body in the UK is a must.
  • No minimum investment requirement.
  • Allowed to be a majority shareholder in your business.
  • Get your partner and children to the UK.
Intra-Company Transfer Visa (ICT)
  • Need to be 18 or over.
  • Current employee of an approved organisation.
  • Minimum 12 months of employment at current organisation outside UK or earn £73,900 or more in the UK.
  • Possess a valid Certificate of Sponsorship.
  • Earn £41,500 or the ‘going rate’ for your job, whichever is higher.
  • Immigration Skills Charge paid.
  • Enough income to support yourself without relying on public funds.
  • Hold a valid TB certificate, if required.
Our thorough evaluation and documentation process is designed with successful UK immigration in mind. We carefully consider your eligibility and adherence to immigration processes ensuring a swift and efficient migration for you and your loved ones.
Discover your British adventure. Find the quickest and most affordable path to your immigration.
Register Now
